description:
Uzuki and Rin come to 346 Production for the first time. They meet the final member, Mio Honda, and the 12 other eccentric members. The trio`s first job is a publicity shoot, and they impress super-idol Mika Jougasaki, who hires them as backup dancers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Never Seen Such a Beautiful Castle
I Never Seen Such a Beautiful Castle
I never seen such a beautiful castle
